prompt: Generate a presentation about the Assessment List for Trustworthy AI (ALTAI) for a general audience.

slides.title: What is ALTAI?
slides.content: ALTAI is a self-assessment tool developed by the High-Level Expert Group to ensure AI systems are trustworthy, based on seven key requirements.

slides.title: Purpose of ALTAI
slides.content: ALTAI provides a practical framework for organizations to assess AI systems’ alignment with ethical principles and fundamental rights.

slides.title: Key Objectives
slides.content: ALTAI aims to provide a self-assessment tool to ensure AI systems are trustworthy, focusing on seven key requirements: human agency, robustness, privacy, transparency, fairness, well-being, and accountability.
